contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox football biography | name = Osvaldo Díaz | fullname = Osvaldo Javier Díaz Gimenez | birth_date = {{birth date and age|df=yes|1981|12|22}} | birth_place = [[Paraguay]] | height = {{Height|m=1.74}} | position = [[Midfielder]] | currentclub = [[Club Guaraní|Guaraní]] | clubnumber = | youthyears1 = | youthclubs1 = | years1 = 2000–2007 | years2 = 2007 | years3 = 2008 | years4 = 2008 | years5 = 2009– | clubs1 = [[Club Guaraní|Guaraní]] | clubs2 = [[Olimpia Asunción]] | clubs3 = [[AC Lugano]] | clubs4 = [[Club 12 de Octubre|12 de Octubre]] | clubs5 = [[Club Guaraní|Guaraní]] | caps1 = 167 | caps2 = 18 | caps3 = 3 | caps4 = 5 | caps5 = 6 | goals1 = 30 | goals2 = 2 | goals3 = 0 | goals4 = 0 | goals5 = 1 | nationalyears1 = 2001 | nationalyears2 = 2004 | nationalteam1 = Paraguay U20 | nationalteam2 = Paraguay U23 | nationalcaps1 = | nationalgoals1 = | pcupdate = 24 May 2008 | ntupdate = }} {{MedalTop}} {{MedalSport | Men's [[Football at the Summer Olympics|Football]]}} {{MedalSilver | [[2004 Summer Olympics|2004 Athens]] | [[Football at the 2004 Summer Olympics|Team Competition]]}} {{MedalBottom}} '''Osvaldo Díaz''' (born 22 December 1981) is a [[Paraguay]]an [[football (soccer)|footballer]]. He currently plays for [[Club Guaraní|Guaraní]]. ==Career== Díaz began his career at [[Club Guaraní]] before moving in mid 2007 to [[Olimpia Asunción]] in the [[Paraguayan Primera División|Paraguayan First Division]]. On 1 February 2008 he was signed by [[AC Lugano]], where he only played a total of 17 minutes in 3 games. {{Citation needed|date=May 2008}} Diaz was part of the silver medal-winning Paraguayan 2004 Olympic football team, which earned a quarter-final place with two victories in the qualifying round. Having finished second in the league, the squad later beat [[South Korea]] in the quarter-finals, and [[Iraq]] in the semi-finals, before losing to [[Argentina]] in the final. ==External links== *{{NFT player|pid=23408}} *{{FIFA player|184679}} {{Paraguay Squad 2004 Summer Olympics}} {{Use dmy dates|date=September 2011}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Diaz, Osvaldo | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = footballer | DATE OF BIRTH = 22 December 1981 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Paraguay]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Diaz, Osvaldo}} [[Category:1981 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Paraguayan footballers]] [[Category:Paraguayan expatriate footballers]] [[Category:Expatriate footballers in Switzerland]] [[Category:Club Guaraní footballers]] [[Category:Club Olimpia footballers]] [[Category:Olympic footballers of Paraguay]] [[Category:Footballers at the 2004 Summer Olympics]] [[Category:Olympic silver medalists for Paraguay]] [[Category:Olympic medalists in football]] [[Category:12 de Octubre footballers]] {{Paraguay-footy-bio-stub}}
